General.Name: Momentus Inc
General.Description: Momentus Inc. provides water-powered transportation services for spacecraft. It engages in providing a shuttle service for satellites. Its shuttles, powered by water plasma engines, then transport these satellites to their target orbits. The company was incorporated in 2017 and is based in Santa Clara, California.
General.Address: 3050 Kenneth St., Santa Clara, CA, United States, 95054

5.Name: Mr. Alexander  Fishkin
5.Title: Gen. Counsel, Chief Bus. Affairs & Legal Officer and Sec.
